title: Aaron Rodgers, Russell Wilson, Warriors and the Blazing 5
itunes:title: Aaron Rodgers, Russell Wilson, Warriors and the Blazing 5
description:
Colin explains how Aaron Rodgers fans have become like Russell Westbrook defenders and that Rodgers has become like Brett Favre. Colin says that the Warriors are Stephen Curry's team and that Kevin Durant needs them more than they need him. And Colin gives you his Blazing 5 picks for this weekend. Guests Include: Greg Jennings, Mitchell Schwartz, John Kuhn, Peter King and Jason McIntyre

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
